BBFN1.M.DE.N.1.L.W00200.S1P.F0.S.NV00.Z0: Short-term liabilities of enterprises vis-à-vis foreign affiliated enterprises arising from financial operations / Total / Industrial countries

General: Up to 1994, including the former Yugoslavia and South Africa; from May 2004, including Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Poland, the Slovak Republic and Slovenia; from January 2007, including Bulgaria and Romania.
